recipe.title: Gluten Free Cheese Muffins
recipe.comment: c/o Fearless Dinning with cazzie tweaks
recipe.ingredient: 1 tsp chopped herbs (I used garlic chives)
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 180C and line muffing tun with paper cups. In a bowl mix eggs, water and melted butter. Add remaining ingredients and stir until combined. Scoop 1/4 cup amounts into prepared muffin tray and cook for 20-30 minutes. Cool muffins in cooling rack. Serve with you favourite soup. You can add 1/2 cup cooked chopped bacon if you are not vegetarian!
